meanings.meaning: 1. nicely; properly; well; skillfully; skilfully Usually written using kana alone, See also 良いそのプロジェクトはよく計画されていて興味深いが、当面の利益には大した結果をもたらさないと見られている。The project is well-planned and interesting, but its immediate impact on the bottom line is not considered substantial.
2. frequently; often Usually written using kana aloneみつなは綺麗好きだから、よく自ら進んで掃除をしています。Mitsuna is very tidy so she often cleans up without being asked.
3. I'm glad that you ...; thank you for ... Usually written using kana alone
4. (you have) quite the nerve to; I don't know how you can ... Usually written using kana aloneよく、そんな口がきけるな！How dare you say that!
善く 【よく】、能く 【よく】、好く 【よく】、克く 【よく】

1. nicely; properly; well; skillfully; skilfully Usually written using kana alone, See also 良いそのプロジェクトはよく計画されていて興味深いが、当面の利益には大した結果をもたらさないと見られている。The project is well-planned and interesting, but its immediate impact on the bottom line is not considered substantial.
2. frequently; often Usually written using kana aloneみつなは綺麗好きだから、よく自ら進んで掃除をしています。Mitsuna is very tidy so she often cleans up without being asked.
3. I'm glad that you ...; thank you for ... Usually written using kana alone
4. (you have) quite the nerve to; I don't know how you can ... Usually written using kana aloneよく、そんな口がきけるな！How dare you say that!

sentences.translation: The project is well-planned and interesting, but its immediate impact on the bottom line is not considered substantial.
Mitsuna is very tidy so she often cleans up without being asked.

1. noh play
1. advertising the excellence of one's wares; boasting; self-advertisement
2. statement of the virtues of a medicine; description of the virtues of a drug See also 効能書き こうのうがき
1. carefully; closely Usually written using kana alone間違いをしないようによくよく注意しよう。Let's take the utmost caution against errors.
2. very; extremely; exceedingly Usually written using kana aloneそんな話にだまされるなんて、よくよくおめでたいね。You must be very naive to be taken in by such a story.
3. have no choice; cannot be helped; unavoidable; inevitable Usually written using kana alone
能く能く 【よくよく】、善く善く 【よくよく】
良く良く: Rarely-used kanji form. 能く能く: Rarely-used kanji form. 善く善く: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: Let's take the utmost caution against errors.
You must be very naive to be taken in by such a story.

meanings.meaning: 1. efficient
1. activity Antonym: 受動
1. active
1. noh mask
1. noh actor
1. to make good; to improve Usually written using kana alone仕事をよりよくする方法について考えるよりも金もうけする方法を考える方が先なのである。Figuring a way to make a dollar comes ahead of thinking about how to do the job better.
2. to do often Usually written using kana aloneこれは学生がよくする間違いだ。This is a mistake students are apt to make.
3. to be kind to; to treat well; to do well Usually written using kana alone母は植木の世話をよくする人だ。My mother looks after the plants well.
善くする 【よくする】、能くする 【よくする】

sentences.translation: Figuring a way to make a dollar comes ahead of thinking about how to do the job better.
This is a mistake students are apt to make.
My mother looks after the plants well.

meanings.meaning: 1. all-purpose; utility; universal もちろん万能ではないからといって価値がないわけではないから、ＧＴＤはダメということにはならない。Of course you can't say that it's worth nothing because it isn't perfect, so that doesn't mean that GTD is useless.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun

3. Mannou
万能 【まんのう】
まんのう: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.

sentences.translation: Of course you can't say that it's worth nothing because it isn't perfect, so that doesn't mean that GTD is useless.
Man is not as almighty as God.
